content: kalta pairs two shades of ultra alpaca light yarn with a geometric mosaic stitch pattern that pops this cozy cowl has a bandana-style shape that s fun to make and easy to wear too this warm stylish accessory is knit from the top down first worked flat like a shawl before joining to work the bottom section in the round berroco ultra alpaca light is a soft blend of superfine alpaca and peruvian highland wool that comes in a range of solid and heathered shades perfect for pairing up in projects like kalta customize your colors to your favorite outfits or choose a set for a knitworthy person on your gift list ***mosaic pattern is charted only *** **finished measurements** neck edge circumference approximately 18 / 45 5 cm lower edge circumference approximately 33 / 84 cm length from center point to neck edge approximately 14 / 35 5 cm length at back neck approximately 4¼ / 11 cm **yarn** berroco ultra alpaca light 50 g 1 hank each #4289 charcoal mix c1 and #42178 grapefruit mix c2 **needles and notions** 24 / 60 cm circular needle size 5 / 3 75 mm *or size to obtain gauge* stitch markers 1 a different color for bor **gauge** 24 sts and 54 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in pattern stitch *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge *
